extendedInfo.description: This app will let you know when thereâs missed calls or unread SMS messages, by: - Flashing the backlight - Playing audio alerts - Donate versions support vibrating the phoneIf it doesn't seem to work, please get in touch before just leaving negative reviews - I'll do my best to help you out.

reviews.title: Not consistent
reviews.comment: Few minutes after setting and tweaking, it did work but another minutes after it didnt. Even until after 8 hours of download. I already donated via paypal. .i hope u can help me
reviews.author: LeeYa Cerna

reviews.title: It works on SGS2, screen flashes too
reviews.comment: Would be nice if you could: 1.optionally not flash the screen (only the bottom button lights), 2.set the duration of the lights on and 3.monitor other notifications (app. install, email, gmail). Thanks though, useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s really amazing, but if you can make it notify on emails and other messages like skype, whatsapp etc. Other than that excellent app :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I use it when my phone\'s plugged in, because the Evo doesn\'t blink the LED to notify when on AC. Would be nice to have an \"only notify when on AC\" opt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing on Galaxy S (Samsung Epic)
reviews.comment: This is very useful! This is only flash on screen, not LED Flash. I use it for almost year!  I using it for text messages more than anything.  I don\'t know if it is work on call or miss call, because I am Deaf.   =)
reviews.author: Carlos Fuentes

reviews.title: Some
reviews.comment: Nice app,1 more star if there\'s option for \"button backlight flashing only\" option instead of screen+button flash..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally..led notify on samsung gs2. Only thing missing is option to flash only hardware buttons or back light independently of each other
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works on SGS2, really wish it had option to flash only buttons and not the whole screen (will happily donate for that)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Simple idea for those without an LED notification light, best version I\'ve found :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ive tried the rest and this works the best! Wish i cud have it alert evry 2 mins or so rather than max of just 1 min a option to switch scrn flash off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Idea
reviews.comment: Nice concept, but not working on Motorola Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well. Really helpful so I can see I\'ve got a message even if I missed the alert.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it. It tells me Hotmail, Gmail, missed call, text. Also got led light, sound and vibrant. Have this in my HTC EVO 4G for a few months now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great and been looking for something like this thanks LG Optimus U!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just excellent!
reviews.comment: Finally, this app work very well wit LG Optimus One! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Much happier with the Donate vesion. HTC Sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: well done.thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only one with notification interval less than a minute. Simple and does what it promises!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved this app... Motodroid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: gaaay
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work on Samsung galaxy s2 and s3!
reviews.author: A Google User
